finished_inscription:
Your registration is almost complete!
You just have to validate your email to access all the services offered by SaTT.
contact_support:
If you did not initiate this registration,
please contact the technical support.
create_secure:
Create and secure your wallet!
Choose and write down your passwords carefully.
We can't help you find it if you lose it.
monetisez_description: Whether you have 50 subscribers or 1 million followers, get paid according to your audience. The SaTT platform is designed to suit as many people as possible. Thanks to the blockchain, be sure to be paid, everything is automated.
automate_campaign: Create, set up and automate your campaign.
automate_campaign_description:
Choose influencers from around the world, small or large.Plan your budget without intermediaries or negotiations. Take control of your campaign, make it a masterpiece in your image.Study your statistics and start over. Take advantage of competitive fees.
You have all the keys in hand to make your campaign a success!
questions_description:
All our support team is available to answer your questions.
Do not hesitate to contact them via our various social networks!
ask_pass: You asked to reset your login password
reject_reason: What is the reason of the rejection ?
valid_wish: The Satt team wishes you good luck
valid_accepted: campaign has been validated by the advertiser.
reject_cmp: campaign has been rejected by the advertiser.
valid_question: When and how do I get my earnings ?
valid_gaz: You can collect your gains at any time, but keep in mind that every transactions cost gas! Remember to verify that you own some ethereum or Binance coins in your wallet in order to do any action interfering with the blockchain.
link: Click on the link below to reset it
reset_pass3: If you did not make this request, ignore this Email
changement_email_presque_terminé: Votre demande de changement d'adresse email est presque terminée !
